text: The 1949 Drexel Dragons football team represented the Drexel Institute of Technology (renamed Drexel University in 1970) as an independent during the 1949 college football season. Otis Douglas was the team's head coach. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Drexel Category:Drexel Dragons football seasons Drexel Football
title: 1949 Drexel Dragons football team
